info.name: Firestore Clone API
info.description: Postman collection for the Firestore Clone API, including Organization, Project, Database, Collection, Document, Index, Batch, Transaction, and Atomic operations.

body.raw:
{
    "organizationId": "{{newOrganizationId}}",
    "displayName": "New Test Organization",
    "billingEmail": "billing@neworg.com",
    "adminEmails": ["admin@neworg.com"],
    "defaultLocation": "us-central1",
    "description": "This is a new organization created via API."
}

query.description: Comma-separated field paths to update. If not specified, all fields are replaced (PATCH behavior might differ).

variable.description: This will be set by the 'Begin Transaction' request's test script.
